Camilla Parker Bowles's friend of more than 40 years has said no-one could do the role of Queen Consort better than her.

articles.title: Bake Off star Matt Lucas reveals heartbreaking family reason he HAD to lose weight... - The Sun
articles.content:
A DRASTICALLY slimmed-down Matt Lucas had Great British Bake Off viewers concerned for his health this week but he insists he lost the weight precisely because he didnt want to die young.
